fixes.name: X
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR idx = 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Index]
VAR wc_percentage = 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[wc_percentage]
VAR wc_pi = 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[wc_pi]
VAR wc_start = 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[wc_start]
RETURN
IF(
    idx < 270,
    SIN(idx * wc_percentage * wc_pi / 180) * wc_start,
    IF(
        idx > 270,
        SIN((540 - idx) * wc_percentage * wc_pi / 180) * (wc_start + 1),
        SIN((idx * wc_percentage + 3) * wc_pi / 180) * (wc_start + 0.5)
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF/ELSEIF/ELSE logic to nested DAX IF statements. All field references were transformed to the table-qualified format 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Column]. Mathematical and trig functions (SIN, multiplication, division) were kept with equivalent DAX functions. Intermediate values were captured in VARs for readability.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation relies on table calculations (INDEX, WINDOW_MAX) and aggregated/windowed fields, which require evaluation in a filter/aggregation context â€” therefore it must be created as a measure.
